name: Dunidle - Incremental RPG Dungeon Crawler
description:
Let's dive in to a new kind of roguelike incremental/idle RPG dungeons game.

Collect gold, upgrade and build your team up with the most powerful heroes. Loot enchanted magical legendary weapons from legendary chest for your heroes. Let's your idle heroes crawl through endless pixel dungeons to battle against monsters the most epic and powerful bosses.

Features:
• Idle, incremental and offline RPG gameplay.
• Beautiful 2D retro pixel graphic style.
• Easy gameplay. Only few taps, then you're ready to go. Forget about clicker and tapping.
• Crawl through endless and random pixel dungeons with a roguelike style. 
• Battle against many different types of monsters and epic bosses from different pixel roguelike dungeons environment.
• Upgrade and manage your party with many different choices of tactic.
• Collect gold, unlock and upgrade levels and skills of the most powerful idle heroes: Knight, Thief, Priest, Archer, Wizard, Barbarian, Druid, Paladin, Templar and Necromancer.
• Loot equipments from mysterious and legendary chests to discover enchanted or legendary new unique weapons for your idle heroes.
• Many types weapons: sword, dagger, bow, staff, mace, spear etc.
• Collect the most powerful artifacts from epic bosses to help your heroes battle with monsters and bosses easier.
• Support both smartphones and tablets.

If you love to crawl through pixel dungeons, leveling up heroes, discover new weapons and battle against monsters and bosses. This is the mobile/tablet game that you are looking for.

Download Dunidle now, the best roguelike incremental/idle RPG game ever.
